lenders.name: Jennifer
lenders.loan_because: I fully subscribe to the belief that if you give a man a fish he'll eat for a day, if you teach a man to fish he'll eat for a lifetime. Assisting people to obtain the tools to be self sufficient betters society world-wide.
lenders.occupational_info:
I work at a company that clones cattle, horses and pigs. The word "clone" causes quite a stir amongst the American public mostly due to a lack of real information as to what cloning really is and what its benefits are.

With a growing human population, and shrinking natural resources, we have to be efficient in how we produce our food. Cloning is a new tool to use in conjunction with regular breeding to pass on desirable but sometimes rare traits like natural disease resistance and efficient feed to meat conversion ratios more effectively. At the end of the day it's still about breeding better animals to feed more people.

lenders.name: Yair
lenders.loan_because: I believe its the right thing to do, no religion necessary.
lenders.occupational_info: I build software for businesses.

lenders.loan_because: It is a Faith Response.  We have 3 grown children, and have a good life.   We hope to make a small difference for someone else in this way.  "If you love Him, why not serve Him".  We loan because we want to share with others.  To do good, you actually have to do something!
lenders.occupational_info:

lenders.occupational_info: I make people laugh!! I love it!!!!

lenders.name: Van

lenders.name: Prairie House Gallery
lenders.occupation: Small gallery dedicated to North American art.
lenders.loan_because: One of the goals of Prairie House Gallery is to be a good neighbour.  In our purchase, we try to buy local.  In our practices, we try to go Green.  Kiva gives us one more way to help leave a better place than it might otherwise have been.
lenders.occupational_info:
Prairie House Gallery is a small on-line art gallery that features local artists, (Midwestern), and other artists from the United States, We typically buy directly from the artist, or from one of their direct distributors. In this way, we try to make sure that the artist gets a fair price for his or her work.
The gallery was our dream.  It is more of a "hobby" than a business because we regularly loose money, but we have fun doing it. We are keeping the website for now, but we are not certain what we will do next. We are looking at the possibility of new lines of products, including period artwork prints rescued from damaged books. We also remain committed to the artists that have sold their works with us, and we provide links to the sites of our artists as they develop them.

lenders.name: www.3outcomes.com
lenders.loan_because: Sharing what I have has me appreciate it. Looking at the people who are starting and enhancing their businesses also has me more inspired with mine. And, I'd love to meet the people I loan to so that I can bring more vitality and money to their families.
lenders.occupational_info: Search on "Living Green" in itunes podcast directory and you will find my podcast. It was rated in the Top 100 of itunes in June of 2007.  I coach business executives and do keynotes. Learn more at www.3outcomes.com.

I have a vast array of interests in which I actively participate and I always enjoy traveling and meeting new people. lenders.loan_because: Everyone has the responsibility to change the world, and make it a better place, and these micro loans are just one way that someone more privileged than others can help make someones life a better one to live.
lenders.occupational_info: I'm 20 years old and am currently a full time college student at Muskegon Community College,eduation is a very important thing to me and i feel very luck to be going here.   I'm still deciding what i want to do with the rest of my life, but i know it's going to be in the Medical Field because i love helping people.

lenders.name: Swati
lenders.loan_because: Because I have been fortunate to grow up in Canada where I have had free education, lived in a very multicultural city with free medical system and never have been a victim of war. I am very privileged and know the feeling of that freedom I have. I feel I have a responsibility to give because I believe that through my loans I could give the opportunity to make poverty a history for one or two or many families.
lenders.occupational_info:
My company is a printing company, which prints all kinds of printed material from, business cards, postcards, posters, books, flyers, ect…..

I also want to make a note that as one of my past promotions for a month, 10% of sales on certain printed materials were given to Kiva. I also have a regular client who comes to print jobs and every job they print through my company they give 10% to Kiva to.

lenders.name: jujo
lenders.loan_because: it makes a difference
lenders.occupational_info: we own a cafe and gift shop in small country town,Joel makes furniture and sculptures to sell ,Jude cooks delicious food for cafe and serves customers.

lenders.name: Jules
lenders.loan_because: I believe in entrepreneurship. Open your eyes and then you'll find the right people who'll inspire and empower you to reach your goal.
lenders.occupational_info: I work in PR /Marketing.

lenders.name: Peter
lenders.loan_because: Everyone who has the courage to take his destiny in its own hand, deserves admiration and support
lenders.occupational_info: Peter is chief of the educationbureau of the city townhall

lenders.name: Miles
lenders.loan_because: I like to believe that it can make a difference.
lenders.occupational_info: I'm studying at university for a PhD in organic chemistry.

lenders.name: Merrie
lenders.loan_because: I can

lenders.name: Melinda
lenders.occupation: Small Business Coach and Life Coach
lenders.loan_because: I have had mentors and coaches who helped me when I needed it and I love to give back.  I am blessed to live in a prosperous country.  We all have a responsibility to help others in need, be that our neighbour or someone in another country.
lenders.occupational_info: The web expert in Business Planning - just for work at home mums!

lenders.name: Heli
lenders.loan_because: I am able to.

lenders.name: Sandy
lenders.loan_because: I want to help people make their dreams come true!
lenders.occupational_info: I help professional photographers take pictures of people for magazines.  I also make videos for nightclubs and promoters.  I hope to start making fundraising videos for non-profit organizations.

lenders.name: Graham
lenders.loan_because: I want to invest in people not organisations or governments.
lenders.occupational_info: Self employed book seller who took up this business after retiring from working for many years for the UK government.

lenders.name: Sandy
lenders.loan_because: I hope that peer to peer lending will continue to grow throughout the world as a solution for finding means and fulfilling dreams.  Thank you, KIVA - for this opportunity to participate in such a wonderful concept!

lenders.name: Heather
lenders.loan_because: I can.
lenders.occupational_info: I currently work for Citizenship and Immigration Canada but I am training to be a teacher.

lenders.name: Terence
lenders.loan_because: I think it is great to loan to others who want health and safety for their family.  What we spend for pleasure can help change the life of a friend I have not met. This is just one step to help others in need and promote good will and peace on this one world we all share.
lenders.occupational_info: I have spent many years teaching HIV /AIDS education.  I had to leave my job to take care of myself.  This is now my 23rd year of living with AIDS.  I want to help others across the world any way I can.

lenders.name: Brian
lenders.loan_because: I care
lenders.occupational_info: learning, playing, helping

lenders.name: Quenjana
lenders.loan_because: I believe good measures return to you tenfold.
lenders.occupational_info: I encourage young people through the inspiration of God's Word and the refreshing spirit of basketball.

lenders.name: Tom
lenders.loan_because: I'm very happy to be able to give hard-working people a little help!

lenders.name: Beth
lenders.loan_because: We are all brothers and sisters on this little blue planet.
lenders.occupational_info: I help facilitate healing  and emotional wholeness for those who have experienced  trauma from life circumstances.

lenders.name: ilyandra
lenders.loan_because: I want to help people that did not have the opportunities I have had.
lenders.occupational_info: I work for a law firm that helps people who have been cheated.

lenders.name: Cathy
lenders.loan_because: I am blessed to have enough for my own family.  I want others to have the ability to provide for their families and live a meaningful life.
lenders.occupational_info: I am a homemaker.  I take care of my husband and my 16-year-old daughter.

lenders.name: Todd
lenders.loan_because: I believe in people helping people.

lenders.name: cynthia
lenders.loan_because: It amazes and thrills me to see how such a small amount of money can make a significant difference in the lives of these people.

lenders.name: Beryl
lenders.loan_because: It is nice to be able to help people to help thenselves, especially in developing areas.

lenders.name: Darcey
lenders.loan_because: Everybody deserves a chance to succeed.

lenders.name: Al W. F.
lenders.loan_because: I have seen the need for microloans in Central America and in the Middle East.  I have great interest in loans in Nigeria.  I intend to follow up in neaar future on closer basis.
lenders.occupational_info: I am an Engineer Officer that has help build schools, clinics, latrines, roads, wells and other projects all as a military officer of U.S. Army.  Army Engineer branch is often the "goodwill" face of our military.  Vast majority of soldiers work very hard and are greatly appreciated for projects we build.  Tremendous sense of satisfaction received in helping and serving others.

lenders.name: LAWR
lenders.loan_because:
i believe Margaret Meade:
"Never doubt that a small group of thoughtful, committed citizens can change the world; indeed, it's the only thing that ever has."
lenders.occupational_info: pro-active advocacy for women

lenders.name: Mark & Joanne
lenders.loan_because: it gives someone the opportunity to improve their lives and develop their skills.

lenders.name: Olivia
lenders.loan_because: I loan because what seems to be a small amount of money makes such a BIG difference in these people's lives.
lenders.occupational_info: I have a creative spirit, teach high school and believe Jesus is the way to eternal peace and love.

lenders.name: KAREN
lenders.loan_because: The Lord has blessed me and therefore I need to bless others less fortunate
lenders.occupational_info: We inspect homes for buyer

lenders.name: Christopher
lenders.loan_because: Everyone deserves a chance to make something of themselves.
lenders.occupational_info: I work at a bank during the summer and study classical music at a school for music during the fall and spring.

lenders.name: Aimee
lenders.loan_because: I feel it makes an impact on people's lives.
lenders.occupational_info: I am a college student majoring in International Relations. I am also a member of the Genocide Intervention Network, a great non-profit organization working to help stop the genocide in Darfur.

lenders.name: Valerie
lenders.loan_because: I have received lots of help, financial and other, and it's meant a lot to me and I think I owe it to those who cared for me to make their efforts worthwhile.
lenders.occupational_info: I am a university professor teaching literature. I think literature can point out or inspire what humanity is and why and how we should really appreciate it.

lenders.name: June
lenders.loan_because: It's a positive way to help people helping themselves.
lenders.occupational_info: I make birthday cakes to order  and for the showcase in a bakery, as well as baking breads and buns

lenders.name: Sara
lenders.loan_because: I saw the program on KIVA on Public Broadcasting and was very impressed. I like the ability to help individuals around the world directly.
lenders.occupational_info: I organize and run a program to support non-native English speakers to get better jobs.

lenders.name: catherine
lenders.loan_because: I like the idea and method

lenders.name: Janet
lenders.loan_because: I have a deep need to share with those in need and have been frustrated by the difficulties involved in trying to financially help peoples in other countries.
lenders.occupational_info: I am a nurse in a hospital who cares for infants and children

lenders.name: Laura
lenders.loan_because: It makes a difference.  I got to see it in action as a Kiva Fellow in Uganda in 2008.

lenders.name: Andrew
lenders.loan_because: I believe that microcredit loans are doing more good than grants or direct aid will ever do
lenders.occupational_info: a doctor in the United States Navy.

lenders.name: Wendy
lenders.loan_because: I want to help other women in the world who aren't as fortunate as I have been.

lenders.name: Kaily
lenders.loan_because: I learned about micro loans in my Senior Current Issues class at my high school in Muskegon, Michigan. I feel that it is important to give people a chance at a good life and to make them feel worthwhile while watching their own business grow.
lenders.occupational_info: I am currently a student at Michigan State University and am hoping to persue a degree in Genomics and Molecular Genetics to become a genetic counselor.

lenders.name: Arizona Family
lenders.loan_because: We believe giving someone a "hand up" is better than giving them a "hand out".

lenders.name: Patty
lenders.loan_because: I can loan a little money and make a difference.
lenders.occupational_info: I spend mornings sorting my mail into delivery order.  I enjoy the variety of spending time with friends in the station and then going out on my own and delivering the mail to my customers.

lenders.name: Wiederhold
lenders.loan_because: I'd like to help poor people around the world.
lenders.occupational_info: I'm a high school student trying to make a difference in the world.

lenders.name: Ernie
lenders.loan_because: It is nice to be able to help others, it makes the world a much better place. It has been said that to those who things have been given much is expected in return. So it is my duty and privilege to give back.
lenders.occupational_info: Support of server/computer operating systems, security, patching, and other such system maintenance.

lenders.name: Summit NW Minisries
lenders.loan_because: It's more blessed to give than to receive.
lenders.occupational_info: We are a group of Christians who share the core value, "service is the highest form of worship".

lenders.name: Barbara
lenders.loan_because: My loan can help others who want to make a better life for themselves and their families.

lenders.name: Lydia E. Robles
lenders.loan_because: I cannot see a better use for my money.

lenders.name: Colleen & Stephen
lenders.loan_because: we believe in this program and are grateful we can contribute.

lenders.name: Kara
lenders.loan_because: I care about the rest of the world. It is everyone's job and responsibility to keep it runing smooth.
lenders.occupational_info: I am a first year college student. I am studing History and Government!

lenders.name: P-Air
lenders.loan_because: I love the idea of being able to positively impact entrepreneurs trying to develop their businesses.
lenders.occupational_info: I work with early stage technology companies to help them grow their businesses by sharing my contacts and ideas to make their ideas bigger.

lenders.name: Tullia F.
lenders.loan_because: I believe in the power of microlending.
lenders.occupational_info: Distilling complex concepts in the simplest and most persuasive way possible.

lenders.name: Thomasina
lenders.loan_because: Even at my level here in the United States which is basic...I still have SO MUCH compared to many of the people featured here on KIVA and in many other parts of the world. I admire people who have some spirit to try and get out of their circumstances and have a chances and opportunities to have the things they need while helping others in their community as well get to a better standard of living.

lenders.name: Gerald
lenders.loan_because: My Violin was run over by a truck in the streets of Mexico while heading to a audition for Mexico's Idol. It was a stratocaster given to me by my great grandfather and I would like to replace it.
lenders.occupational_info: I work as a violin player

lenders.name: Mahadir
lenders.loan_because: I want to establish an educational foundation to help inland people in East Kalimantan by providing schools with high quality books and courses to develop their region. I took this step since the education dept in my country still has difficulties providing schools inland of borneo with high quality materials. Hopefully with the present of my foundation, all of this problem can be decreased
lenders.occupational_info: I am an English teacher in East Borneo, Indonesia. My school name is SMAN 10 Melati Samarinda. You can find everything about the school by visiting our website: www.sma10melati.com

lenders.name: Steven
lenders.loan_because: I'm able and it's the right thing to do.

lenders.name: Valerie
lenders.loan_because: I know what it takes to run its own business.
lenders.occupational_info: I am self-employed. I translate and localize video games.

lenders.name: Arturo & Elizabeth
lenders.loan_because:
Luke 6:30
"Give to everyone who asks you, and if anyone takes what belongs to you, do not demand it back."
lenders.occupational_info: We are regular people with ordinary jobs but through the gift of salvation in Jesus Christ, we have become tremendously blessed in the spirit and we want to share that joy with you.  God Bless you.  (^_^)

lenders.name: Emily
lenders.loan_because: I am deeply impressed by the punctual repayment rates of borrowers in developing countries compared with the high default rates of borrowers in the U.S.  Loaning through Kiva is one way to recognize and support people for their integrity and their initiative.

lenders.name: Eleanor
lenders.loan_because: I want to support small 'craft' businesses like myself!
lenders.occupational_info: I design patterns for handknitted garments.

lenders.loan_because:
We know what it is like to need a little
help for a project in which we believe.
lenders.occupational_info:
Choosing, buying & selling 
books & nice gifts in our store

lenders.name: Jane
lenders.loan_because:
I believe we can change the world, one person at a time.  It is not just "live and let live," but "live and help live."

"In this life we cannot do great things. We can only do small things with great love."  Mother Teresa 

"If a free society cannot help the many who are poor, it cannot save the few who are rich."  John F Kennedy, 35th US president

My charities:
Donors Choose:  http://www.donorschoose.org/homepage/main.html
Food for the Poor:  http://www.foodforthepoor.org/
Global Giving:  http://www.globalgiving.com/
Habitat for Humanity:  http://www.habitat.org/
lenders.occupational_info: I am a registered nurse and provide acute dialysis services for our 4 area hospitals.

lenders.name: Vance
lenders.loan_because: I like hugs.
lenders.occupational_info: It's like pizza.

lenders.name: Howard & Lucy

I am retired at the moment  but hope  to work again.

Lucy, my wife, is a counselor.

lenders.name: Irja
lenders.loan_because: I loan because I can. Kiva makes it easy!

lenders.name: Larry Schoonover
lenders.loan_because: I was very moved while reading an article some years ago about this concept.  I recently was on a trip and read the InFlight magazine on Alaska Airlines which had an article about micro-lending and renewed my interest.  I intend to do more personally and to motivate others to get involved as well.  I am interested in finding others in my area who are lenders.
lenders.occupational_info: Speaker, Author and all around good guy.

lenders.name: Phil
lenders.loan_because: I'll never be able to pay back all the people who have helped me.

lenders.name: Linnéa & Johan
lenders.loan_because: Because we can.

lenders.name: Marlene

lenders.name: Gordon

1. It can end poverty.

lenders.name: Jesse

lenders.name: C.c.

lenders.occupational_info: I am a Registered Nurse and take care of minor to very sick people.  God gives me the strength to continue to help heal those in need.

lenders.name: Paymon
lenders.loan_because: it is a right thing to do!

lenders.name: Bruce
lenders.loan_because: my grandmother was a small business owner
lenders.occupational_info: help people find jobs

lenders.name: Higgins
lenders.loan_because: My students contribute to a charity bucket every time they are caught cussing.  They then choose what worthy cause the money goes to. It turns a negative into a positive.  This last year they chose Kiva (with a little encouragement from me.) I figured it had the advantage of being a continuing impact and they could see the person they were helping.
lenders.occupational_info: I attempt to teach high school kids social studies and hopefully a little bit of the "greater good" concept.

lenders.name: Mark
lenders.loan_because: It is a small token I can give to try to change someone else's life. It gives me instant gratification!
lenders.occupational_info: My company helps football/soccer clubs in Brazil make more money by managing their membership base

lenders.name: Judy
lenders.loan_because: I love the idea of helping other women achieve their dream of owning their own businesses!!

lenders.name: Chirag
lenders.loan_because: that loan will empower someone to improve their life...
lenders.occupational_info: I work on computers.

lenders.name: George & Cindy

lenders.loan_because: Capitalism is always better than charity.  People need to learn to help themselves, and mirco-loans are the way to do that.
lenders.occupational_info: I run a number of internet-based companies.

lenders.name: Dor
lenders.loan_because: To offer someone else an opportunity to improve their life. We all deserve that opportunity.

lenders.name: Joel and Emily

lenders.occupational_info: We own a custom window coverings franchise, Budget Blinds.  Joel manages our business, and Emily works for Hewlett Packard as a Software Team Manager.

lenders.name: Alex
lenders.loan_because: i like to see people develop to their full potential
lenders.occupational_info: i build computer networks

lenders.name: Gail
lenders.loan_because: You have to add your light to the sum of light a wise man once said.
lenders.occupational_info: I love my job. I see regular customers every day . I get to listen to good music while I work.When the store is not busy I can clean or even watch movies on my little dvd player. It's the most fun job I've had.

lenders.name: Andrew
lenders.loan_because:
I want to put something back into this world. 

We have an opportunity to help people help themselves which charity does not do.
lenders.occupational_info: I work in IT defining companies Voice communication strategies and directions.

lenders.name: David
lenders.loan_because: I have had a successful carrier because people people had confidence in me and helped me get started.  Now, it is my turn to help others realize their goals
lenders.occupational_info: I am retired after 30 plus years working in the energy field.  I now consult for selected clients and donate time and support to my local church and my college.

lenders.name: Narayan
lenders.loan_because: Small drops make the ocean

lenders.name: Rafin
lenders.loan_because: It helps!

lenders.name: Christine
lenders.loan_because: I want to help change the world one person at a time.

lenders.name: Jaime
lenders.loan_because: I am blessed with health and love and happiness and laughter and amazing friends and family. If I can help repay even a fraction of my blessings, I will try to do so.
lenders.occupational_info: I work as Marketing and Communications Manager for Envirofit International, a non-profit working to bring pollution-reducing technologies to developing world markets.

lenders.name: Mark
lenders.loan_because:
I am a capitalist, who believes in the power of small business to change the world.  Small business owners have an investment in their community.  And therefore it is in their best interest to try to improve their environment. 

Giving money and resources away is usually a disaster in the long run.  But when money is loaned, the recipient has a vested interest in improving his or her business, creating a self sustainable situation.
lenders.occupational_info: I work with computers, to maintain web sites that sell products over the internet.

lenders.name: Bernie
lenders.occupational_info: Help promote companies and organizations using various methods such as promotional products and apparel, direct mail, and incentives

lenders.name: Joanne
lenders.loan_because: I love the fact that even a small amount of money can make such a big difference to the lives of these people.  I donate to a number of other charities/organizations where I never see the person that my donation actually helps.  I love the fact that I get to see who I am helping!  It makes it feels so much more personal.
lenders.occupational_info: I am at home with my young kids.

lenders.name: Alex
lenders.loan_because: When people can be helped sustainably, that's better than charity.
lenders.occupational_info: I use computer simulations to study white blood cells.

lenders.name: Scott & Susan
lenders.loan_because: sometimes it takes just a little help to change peoples lives. In my past, I know God has helped me a lot through others by the little they did.

lenders.name: Nanda
lenders.loan_because: "No man is an island,entire of itself; every man is a piece of the continent------because I am involved in mankind" John Donne.

lenders.name: Ann
lenders.loan_because: every little bit helps.
lenders.occupational_info: I work in a university museum to develop programs that teach people about art.

lenders.name: Husslage Family
lenders.loan_because: We believe in empowering people to become the best they can be - to stand on their own and be proud.
lenders.occupational_info: We believe that family comes first and education is at the top of the list.

lenders.name: Wahyudi
lenders.occupation: just graduated from Senior High School

lenders.loan_because: It's a great way to help people help themselves.

lenders.name: Shivani & Niranjan

lenders.occupational_info: I work with computers to create websites.

lenders.name: Mikko
lenders.loan_because: I can

lenders.name: Nicholas
lenders.loan_because: I think it is one of the most efficient, productive and satisfying ways to lend a hand to those trying to help themselves -- creating my own, essentially revolving, fund that can be used by many.
lenders.occupational_info: I am a school teacher in a university's college of law (a law professor) helping train future lawyers to be socially conscious as well as professionally skilled.

lenders.name: Phil
lenders.loan_because: If we all don't do our part then there is a bleak future for our planet.
lenders.occupational_info: I enjoy giving the children dreams to pursue and the tools to get them there.

lenders.occupational_info: We are a group of mothers with grown children who would like to see other mothers around the world succeed in their business endeavors.

lenders.name: Rebecca

lenders.name: Rod I.

lenders.name: Sam

I would like to challenge other bus drivers to make as large of loan as possible, to help people be independent and to provide for their families.
lenders.occupational_info: Doing the impossible for the ungrateful...

lenders.name: Bev
lenders.loan_because: I want to help others make a better life for themselves and their children.

lenders.name: Rallllle

Acknowledging how blessed they are, the Bladarion Finance Group seeks opportunities to share these blessings with others.

Actively engaged in "helping real people in the real world", the Bladarion Finance Group (BFG) seeks to help people around the world through multiple outlets

lenders.loan_because: Am a self sponsored student and my big problem is school fees .i would like to get the loans to help me finish my studies and even start business which will generate money to me as i study.also the money can help my parents to get there daily bread
lenders.occupational_info: if i get the loan fast i will finish by school and then engage in business that will enable me to earn money and repay the loan .

lenders.name: lifeofpatrick
lenders.loan_because:
"Give me a stock clerk with a goal and I'll give you a man who will make history. Give me a man with no goals and I'll give you a stock clerk."  
-James Cash Penney , an American businessman

lenders.name: Jocelyn
lenders.loan_because: I believe in the power of women to uplift themselves and their families. I am blessed to live in the United States and have the opportunities that many women across the globe do not have. If I can help through small acts, then it is my honor.
lenders.occupational_info: I work for a non-profit organization in the Silicon Valley that supports public education through grantmaking. Our current focus is on science, technology and engineering, but we also have programs in math and literacy. I process all of our grants, manage IT for the entire foundation and manage the office as well as do some financial work. Ultimately I plan to return to school to get my masters in international development and to pursue a NPO/NGO career focusing on African women's issues.

lenders.name: InsureMe
lenders.occupation: Helping People Find the Right Insurance
lenders.loan_because: At InsureMe we consider it our responsibility to give not only to our local community, but to the global community. We help by donating 10% of our yearly profits to charitable organizations all over the world.
lenders.occupational_info: InsureMe is a company that helps people find affordable insurance to protect their health, homes and other valuables. We’ve been helping people save money since 1993, and are located in Denver, Colorado, USA.
